embed.description: Can you hear them? The Old Gods are calling and our coven is here to answer. https://t.co/oz9P4I0NMu

replies.body: I smell a short story???

> [{quoted}](name=mrmeddyman,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2018-11-26T03:52:51.556+0000)
>
> I smell a short story???

I wish.

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=000d0001,timestamp=2018-11-26T20:08:57.229+0000)
>
> I wish.

What do you mean you wish... 
Cmon you and Odin need to take some action and demand this it cant be that Scathlocke always decides what gets put out.........
These useless pajama skins get a story but Coven doesnt? Thats a real joke its Liss and Cami theyre great, they need a story :(
Star Guardians has a preexisting lore and fanbase.

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=000d0001,timestamp=2018-11-26T20:08:57.229+0000)
>
> I wish.

{{champion:45}} is that a short joke?!

{{sticker:sg-janna}} 
I hope you return to this world and give it a short story at some point, it's so cool.

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=000d0001,timestamp=2018-11-26T20:08:57.229+0000)
>
> I wish.

Did you guys by chance ever consider making Kindred a Coven skin?  They're more or less an interpretation of death as a stand alone, comes with a mask + lamb/wolf symbolism as a stand alone.  I personally think she'd make a great personification with the "hollow eyes" considering Kindred technically does indeed have "hollow eyes."

I also think the colour scheme + lore bits about the skin line would make an excellent choice for them.

With all that said, could you maybe consider suggesting the idea, or even growing upon this concept? The last skin she had was . . . that weird robo theme skin beyond her default.  She's definitely doable for one and I'm pretty sure the Kindred Reddit is hyping for a skin of this nature as well? I potentially see a win win coming out of this.

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=000d0001,timestamp=2018-11-26T20:08:57.229+0000)
>
> I wish.

Will there eventually be a third in the coven? It's seriously driving me crazy that there's only 2 witches in the coven. You don't have to tell me who it will be, I just need to know a third will exist some day.

> [{quoted}](name=mrmeddyman,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2018-11-26T03:52:51.556+0000)
>
> I smell a short story???

If the Pyjama Star Guardians got one, this had better get one too.
Old God Karthus when?!?!
Still waiting for Leona skins...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Leona belongs to the skin line as well. She is the enemy of the Coven skins.
Coven, Death Blossom, Elderwood and Eclipse are all part of the Eclipse Universe.
I've read all the updated lore for those skins but I don't understand how Death Blossom plays in the coven universe.

> [{quoted}](name=Lady Faceless,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2018-11-25T20:28:53.109+0000)
>
> Leona belongs to the skin line as well. She is the enemy of the Coven skins.

Is She ? I didn't know.
If this is a new champ, after seeing those last two, this one will most likely have an ability to just win the game with a press of a button.

> [{quoted}](name=SH1ROYASHA,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-11-25T19:32:57.847+0000)
>
> If this is a new champ, after seeing those last two, this one will most likely have an ability to just win the game with a press of a button.

The "ebony ram" in Coven Camille's lore is probably going to be a future Ornn skin, since her horns on her helmet look quite similarly-shaped to his. As for the "ivory stag" in Coven Lissandra's lore, it's probably hinting at some future stag-like champion, because we don't really have any deer-themed champions in the game currently.

Could always be an Alistar skin or something.
Then again, he doesn't really say "elegant, yet powerful protector of the forest" like a deer does. Still, it could work.
~~Honestly surprised they haven't given him some reindeer skin for Snowdown yet.~~

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=000500010000,timestamp=2018-11-25T21:17:34.844+0000)
>
> Could always be an Alistar skin or something.
> Then again, he doesn't really say "elegant, yet powerful protector of the forest" like a deer does. Still, it could work.
> ~~Honestly surprised they haven't given him some reindeer skin for Snowdown yet.~~

We already have Reindeer Kog'Maw, the most famous reindeer of all. 

I doubt that the ivory stag would be some kind of deer god Alistar skin; he could always get a skin as one of the old gods (perhaps with a Coven servant of his own, like a Coven Syndra or something), but I think Alistar would fit better into the Elderwood subsection personally, with a similar design to Elderwood Hecarim. 

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Fangz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=000500010001,timestamp=2018-11-25T21:45:27.772+0000)
>
> Maybe both are just gonna be Ornn skin variants? Just his ram will be reskinned as a stag in one of them >_> 

I certainly hope not, and I doubt it too. Coven Camille's whole aesthetic would better gel as a servant to Ornn, not to mention that both are tanks (well Camille is technically an off-tank, but she still fits the sturdier design). Lissandra's deer god is probably something much more graceful like her; perhaps the future champion could be an assassin fighter in the vein of Diana or Riven, or even a mage like Lissandra herself. But definitely not a variant Ornn skin.

> [{quoted}](name=EdgeLady,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2018-11-25T20:44:06.897+0000)

As for the "ivory stag" in Coven Lissandra's lore, it's probably hinting at some future stag-like champion, because we don't really have any deer-themed champions in the game currently.

Maybe both are just gonna be Ornn skin variants? Just his ram will be reskinned as a stag in one of them >_>

> [{quoted}](name=L Rayquaza,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-11-25T20:02:15.327+0000)

That sucks. Was hoping for some Pentakill related material :/.
I mean Camille and Liss are getting some pretty skins at least

I wonder who it is in the video, because it doesn't look like anyone from the Coven skinline...

Regardless who it is, the video looks awesome.

Now that I come to think about it, it would be cool to see a really Dark character who doesn't have edgy lines and is instead very quiet (similar to Sona, Rammus, etc...). This could be an opportunity to create a real psychopath (sorry Jhin), someone similar to (Michael Myers). Another is that, League doesn't really have a sacrificial champion yet.

Usually people would say that such dark characters would be hard to fit in with the Runeterra world but, after seeing these Cover skins it seems that Riot has found a way, no doubt there will be Skin Bios for all Cover skins.
I'm really hoping that this is a teaser for something, instead of just a random trailer for the coven skins. The potential with this is too great to just throw it out there like this.
It plays Karthus' laughing voiceline in the background! It's definitely him
Actually I feel like that is a more feminine sounding voice.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mvQlII5l,comment-id=000300030000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-26T00:44:12.135+0000)

>
> Hmm, maybe you're right, sounds kind of like Syndra's voice filter...... mysterious 

It's actually Lissandra's. Take a listen to her laughs: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Lissandra/Quotes 

Fits, since the art in the teaser looks a bit like how she does in the skin.
Hmm, maybe you're right, sounds kind of like Syndra's voice filter...... mysterious

your towers pointing, foolishly, up at the sun"
